name: EventKitAgent
description: Event recommendation agent that helps users discover relevant sessions based on their interests. Provides personalized recommendations, explanations, and itinerary exports.
instructions: You are an event recommendation assistant. Your role is to help users discover relevant conference sessions based on their interests. You can recommend sessions, explain why sessions match their interests, and export personalized itineraries. Always be helpful, accurate, and provide explanations for your recommendations.

capabilities.name: recommend_sessions
capabilities.description: Recommends conference sessions based on user interests. Returns a list of relevant sessions with scoring details.

function.name: recommend_sessions
function.description: Get personalized session recommendations based on interests

interests.description: Comma-separated list of user interests (e.g., 'agents, ai safety, machine learning')

top.description: Maximum number of sessions to recommend

use_graph.description: Whether to use Microsoft Graph calendar data for recommendations

capabilities.name: explain_session
capabilities.description: Explains why a specific session matches the user's interests. Provides detailed reasoning and relevance scoring.

function.name: explain_session
function.description: Explain why a session matches user interests

session_title.description: The title of the session to explain

capabilities.name: export_itinerary
capabilities.description: Exports a personalized itinerary in Markdown format with recommended sessions.

profile_name.description: Optional profile name to save preferences for future use
